author: Schmoaaaaah
description: Always now what you're current status on you're Minecraft Server is.
end_user_data_statement: This Olugin uses you're Servers address to get it's current status.
install_msg: add and remove Server by typing [p]addmcserver || [p]removemcserver. fetch the status by typing [p]mcserverstats.
name: MCServerstats
